p: The dynamics domain of the “follow-up Part B” form of the ACSS and the assessment of overall efficacy by the investigator and patient were considered for evaluation of clinical outcome. For the purpose of dichotomization, items rated 0 and 1 in the dynamics domain and “very good” and “good” by the investigator or patient were merged and classified as “clinical cure.” Consequently, the three remaining items were merged to “failure.” All analyses were conducted on the full analysis set, which included all patients treated with the investigational medicinal product at least once and were not potentially unblinded.
